description: ROS1 example of a generic manipulator with URDF description, MoveIt motion planning, and Gazebo simulation. Focus on completing missing integration logic rather than parameter tuning.
expected_outcome: URDF defines a complete manipulator with consistent joints, links, and transmissions.
MoveIt demo can launch successfully and visualize the robot model.
Gazebo simulation loads controllers and accepts trajectory commands.
Planned trajectories in MoveIt result in simulated joint motion in Gazebo.
